subtitle: History of illness (Last 12months)
question_heading: Do you, or have you ever suffered from any of the following :
instruction: For questions 1 to 12 inclusively, indicate if you have you ever suffered from any of the following conditions by underlining the appropriate condition and providing details in the comments box on the back page

questions.name: healthQ1
questions.question: Tuberculosis, pleurisy, asthma, bronchitis, or any other lung, throat or ear complaint, including deafness.

questions.name: healthQ2
questions.question: Any disorder of the heart, circulatory system, high blood pressure

questions.name: healthQ3
questions.question: Persistent indigestion, gastric or duodenal ulcer, intestinal complaint or rupture

questions.name: healthQ5
questions.question: Any psychological or nervous, panic attack, stroke complaint

questions.name: healthQ6
questions.question: Diabetes, gout or any kidney or bladder complaint

questions.name: healthQ7
questions.question: Any arthritis, slipped disc, rheumatism, back trouble or upper limb problem

questions.name: healthQ8
questions.question: Dermatitis, other skin complaint or allergic condition

questions.name: healthQ11
questions.question: Any eye complaint including blurred vision or eye discomfort (excluding coughs/cold/flu or any of the conditions listed above)

questions.name: healthQ13
questions.question: Do you normally wear glasses or contact lenses?

questions.name: healthQ14
questions.question: When did you last have an eyesight test?

commentBoxQuestions.name: boxQ1
commentBoxQuestions.question: Do you have any difficulty in recognising different colours?

commentBoxQuestions.name: boxQ2
commentBoxQuestions.question: Have you ever failed a medical examination of any kind?

commentBoxQuestions.name: boxQ3
commentBoxQuestions.question: Have you ever consulted, or been recommended to consult a medical specialist

commentBoxQuestions.name: boxQ4
commentBoxQuestions.question: Have you ever been in hospital as a patient?

commentBoxQuestions.name: boxQ5
commentBoxQuestions.question: Are you currently on any treatment being prescribed by a Doctor?

commentBoxQuestions.name: boxQ6
commentBoxQuestions.question: With reference to the Disability Discrimination Act, do you have any physical or mental impairment, which significantly affects your daily living?
commentBoxQuestions.note: (If you answer ‘Yes’ to question 20, you may be sent a supplementary health questionnaire for completion so that the medical staff can assess appropriate and reasonable work adjustments for you)
